# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The position of the first code unit if the UTF-8 view is nonempty.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: String.UTF8View.Index { get }
```

## Discussion

If the UTF-8 view is empty, `startIndex` is equal to `endIndex`.
title: startIndex
